comments:
Description:
IllegalArgumentException when click item in row area of x-tab.

Build number:2.2.0.v2007042309

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report.
2. Click Year Data item in row area.

Expected result:
No errors.

Actual result:
First time, Property Editor display related properties, then I click format datetime in Property Editor, I got NPE.
After that, each time I click Year Data item will throw exception.
